text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1993. ==Events== *8 March - Barbara Dex is selected to represent Belgium at the 1993 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Iemand als jij". She is selected to be the thirty- eighth Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the Knokke Casino in Knokke. ==Debuts== *31 August - Wittekerke (1993-2008) ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *VTM Soundmixshow (1989-1995, 1997-) ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths==
title: 1993 in Belgian television
